comments.content:
Detailed Report: https://oss-fuzz.com/testcase?key=5108333216530432

Project: samba
Fuzzing Engine: libFuzzer
Fuzz Target: fuzz_nmblib_parse_packet
Job Type: libfuzzer_asan_samba
Platform Id: linux

Crash Type: Heap-buffer-overflow READ 1
Crash Address: 0x602000004b9f
Crash State:
  parse_nmb_name
  parse_alloc_res_rec
  parse_nmb
  
Sanitizer: address (ASAN)

Recommended Security Severity: Medium

Regressed: https://oss-fuzz.com/revisions?job=libfuzzer_asan_samba&range=202001150416:202001160547

Reproducer Testcase: https://oss-fuzz.com/download?testcase_id=5108333216530432

Issue filed automatically.

See https://wiki.samba.org/index.php/Fuzzing for instructions to reproduce this bug locally.
When you fix this bug, please
  * mention the fix revision(s).
  * state whether the bug was a short-lived regression or an old bug in any stable releases.
  * add any other useful information.
This information can help downstream consumers.

If you need to contact the OSS-Fuzz team with a question, concern, or any other feedback, please file an issue at https://github.com/google/oss-fuzz/issues. Comments on individual Monorail issues are not monitored.

This bug is subject to a 90 day disclosure deadline. If 90 days elapse
without an upstream patch, then the bug report will automatically
become visible to the public.

ClusterFuzz testcase 5108333216530432 is verified as fixed in https://oss-fuzz.com/revisions?job=libfuzzer_asan_samba&range=202001210619:202001220645

If this is incorrect, please file a bug on https://github.com/google/oss-fuzz/issues/new

This bug has been fixed for 30 days. It has been opened to the public.

- Your friendly Sheriffbot
